alert.note: Alert for Shelby; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 13 at 3:25PM CDT until April 13 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Central Crittenden County in eastern Arkansas... South central Tipton County in western Tennessee... Central Shelby County in western Tennessee... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 325 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm producing a tornado was located over Jennette, or 10 miles southwest of Marion, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Bartlett, West Memphis, Marion, Millington, Meeman Shelby Forest State Park, Memphis, Lakeland, Arlington, Crawfordsville, Edmondson, Sunset, Jericho, Jennette, Ellendale, Frayser, Midtown Memphis, Downtown Memphis, Eads, Crittenden and Atoka. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a storm shelter or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
